title: A LOOK INSIDE QB BATTLE IN CFP NATIONAL CHAMPIONSHIP
description:
Wendi Nix, Desmond Howard, David Pollack and Todd McShay take a look at the battle between Bryce Young and Stetson Bennett in the CFP National Championship. Bryce Young, the 2021 Heisman Award Winner takes on Stetson Bennett, UGA's walk on wonder. Who has the edge in the National Championship, find out in the latest CFB Live Podcast.
